pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DALL-E FOR FREE :heart: ## HOW TO USE1. INSTALL DALLE43: `pip install -U dalle43`2. GENERATE AN IMAGE ```pythonimport dalle43.dalle43 as DALL_EDALL_E.generate('the milky way') # returns the image path, e.g. 'C:\\Users\\0ut0flin3\\Pictures\\generated_images\\892348097.jpg' ```You can also use show() to show the image:```pythonimg = DALL_E.generate('the milky way') # returns the image path, e.g. 'C:\\Users\\0ut0flin3\\Pictures\\generated_images\\892348097.jpg' DALL_E.show(img)```3. Enjoy! :heart:![Screenshot from 2023-03-20 02-32-03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/114559605/226227544-66d2e956-8bd6-43d5-8397-41e720674b7a.png)
